Landing.title: Unlock the Hidden Secrets of Your Dreams
Landing.description: Dream Meaning is an AI-powered dream analysis app. Uncover dream meanings & symbolism. Get personalized insights from advanced AI. Keep a dream journal & discover yourself through dreams.

Home.subHelper:
Immerse yourself in your dream with intense emotions and clear details. Describe it as if you were telling a friend a scene from a movie - make it come to life! This helps our AI analyze and decode its true meaning.

For example, instead of saying 'I dreamed that I was flying', try 'I dreamed that I was flying through the clouds with wings like an eagle, feeling elated and free'. The essence of your dream will guide our powerful analysis.
Home.forExample: For example, instead of saying 'I dreamed I was flying,' try 'I dreamed I was flying through the clouds with wings like an eagle, feeling elated and free.' The essence of your dream will guide our powerful analysis.
